Pre-Game Insights: Wales and Poland square off in the Euro 2024 Group D final with a spot in the tournament on the line.
Wales made light work of Finland in the semi-finals with a 4-1 victory, while Poland defeated Estonia 5-1.
Wales has a seven-match unbeaten run and has scored in each of their last six contests, though they've failed to keep a clean sheet in their last four games.
Poland has a respectable unbeaten run under Michal Probierz and has won their last six matches against Wales in all tournaments since 2001.
